name: Planeshifter- Enter The Feywilds
description:
Play in Fullscreen and with sound on for better experience

A submission for the GDKO 2023 Game Jam, round 1.

The task is to "Create a Single Level in a Unique Location".

Gameplay etc. not required. This is purely to show of creativity and level design skills.

Play as a "Planeshifter" ; A person tasked with going back and forth between the real world and the Fairy Realm (known by many names (Feywilds, Ethereal Plane, Fairy Kingdom etc.)).  

Gameplay for this game is purely just sailing around exploring, as per the Game Jam requirements. I hope you enjoy :)

(UI, Art, Rocks, Boat, Pillars, all associated textures for these, Voice Work, & Level Design and Layout all created by me)

(Flora, particle effects, & various props such as lamps, sticks, bridges etc. obtained from the "Toon Fantasy Nature" Asset. Background SFX from "Fantasy Sounds Bundle" Asset)
